name: Data Access Security Report Created
description: Notify user that a new data access security report has been created.
subject: A new Data Access Security report is waiting for you: '$report.name' of type '$report.type'
body:
Hello,

Please find below a link to the '$report.name' report of type: $report.type.
The report has been created by $report.createdByDisplayName at $report.createDate (UTC).

Click here to view the report on Data Access Security.


This is an automatic message sent to you by Data Access Security - Please do not reply.
